Rules.RuleText: Insults, discrimination, extremist and racist statements or texts are taboo.
We reserve the right to exclude people from the server who share extremist or racist ideas or who clearly disturb the server harmony.
Decisions of the team members, both the supporter and the admin are to be accepted without discussion.
Provocations and toxic behavior will not be tolerated and punished! Be friendly to fellow players and your team, both in chat and in voice!
The use of external programs, scripts and cheats is not tolerated and is punished with a permanent exclusion.
